document_data.name: Hespal Nicort
document_data.mainbody:
'''Hespal Nicort''' was a [[half-orc]] commander of the city guard of the city of [[Suormpar]] in [[Ulgarth]] around [[1367 DR]], leading 500 footmen and 200 archers. Although half orc, Hespal vehemently hated [[orc]]s.

By 1367 DR, warnings circulated that the [[gray orc]]s of the [[Dustwall Mountains]] were gathering in preparation for a major assault or raids into Ulgarth. Suormpar was directly threatened, and Hespal Nicort would be leading the defense.
